QuestData.Title: Put the Fear in Them
QuestData.Description: Do you see the trail below us, $n? That is MY trail. And if the Alliance dogs choose to use my trail, they'd best be looking over their shoulder.$B$BIt's time to collect my toll! Slay the footsoldiers from Honor's Stand and see if we can't send them scurrying back to their walls.$B$BBe sure to take out at least one of their officers patrolling the road. They need to realize that nobody is safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Honor's Stand Footmen and 1 Honor's Stand Officer.
QuestData.CompletionText: I take great pleasure in striking the Alliance and disappearing into these hills. They must think they are facing far greater numbers.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, $n. It will be some time before we can assault the hold proper, but until then, we must teach them to fear the Barrens.
